governor_profile.angelic_role: Angel of Voracious Abyss; guides stoneclad guardians.
governor_profile.essence: In VIXPALG's presence, the atmosphere grows intensely heavy and demanding an insatiable force that hungers for more, pulling all energy into its voracious embrace.

form.name: crystalline
form.description: A multi-faceted obsidian construct with razor-sharp geometric edges, representing the consuming nature of Air and the penetrating wisdom of Capricorn's stone-like determination

color.reasoning: Black represents the void of Binah, silver signifies Air's mercurial intelligence, shifting pattern reflects the consuming transformative power of the Devil archetype

geometry.reasoning: Octahedron symbolizes Air element, fractal spirals represent infinite consumption and recursive cosmic patterns

environment.reasoning: Demonstrates VIXPALG's ability to draw all energetic substance into its consuming essence

time_variations.reasoning: Reflects the dynamic nature of consuming consciousness across multiple dimensional states

energy_signature.reasoning: Primordial energy represents the fundamental consuming force of existence

symbol_set.reasoning: Symbols representing penetrative wisdom and transformative consumption

light_shadow.reasoning: Emphasizes the consuming nature that dissolves boundaries between light and darkness

special_properties.reasoning: Manifestation of total consumption across multiple existential planes

governor_profile.name: VIXPALG
governor_profile.title: 'He who consumes'
